items.headline: My mother’s lawyer stole $400K after she moved to a nursing home. How do we get our money back?
items.summary_en: “Within a month, her home had fraudulently been put up for sale and her vehicle stolen.”

items.headline: Are your parents afraid of investing in crypto? How to talk with them so they’ll actually listen.
items.summary_en: ‘I was fearful,’ a father admits. His son didn’t sugarcoat the risk: ‘You should not be surprised to see 70% drawdown on alt coins and even bitcoin.’

items.headline: ‘Am I the biggest loser with the Fed rate cut?’ I’m 68, retired and live off IRAs and Social Security
items.summary_en: “I live a comfortable life, but the Fed’s decision won’t make a blind bit of difference to me.”

items.headline: Social Security is on track to be insolvent in less than 10 years — but its commissioner says there’s ‘plenty of time’ to find a solution
items.summary_en: The Old-Age and Survivors Insurance fund is expected to run out of money by 2033 at the latest, recent reports show.

items.headline: I’m 88 and leaving my $450,000 estate to my son because he has children. Is that wrong?
items.summary_en: “My other children have relationships, but they are unmarried and have no children.”

items.headline: ‘I am highly alarmed by the proposed changes to retirement accounts’: I don’t want bitcoin or private equity in my 401(k). What can I do?
